noun.description: A person who breaks or fails to comply with a rule or formal agreement.
examples: a major crackdown on violators of immigration regulations
the new smoking restrictions call for hefty fines for violators

noun.description: A person who treats something with irreverence or disrespect.
A person who rapes or sexually assaults someone.
examples: Monica is able to name the violators of her body
a curse pronounced over the violators of children
